title: Magic Face C1-Mobius
summary: Mobius is beautiful and elegant watch faces. One side and only one boundary
description: Magic Face C1-Mobius is a surface with only one side and only one boundary. Mobius is elegant watch faces. The Möbius strip has the mathematical property of being non-orientable. It can be realized as a ruled surface. More facesIf you like Face C1-Mobius, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformSupported Devices:Watch Face C1-Mobius supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. descriptionHTML:
Magic Face C1-Mobius is a surface with only one side and only one boundary. Mobius is elegant watch faces.
The Möbius strip has the mathematical property of being non-orientable. It can be realized as a ruled surface.

More faces
If you like Face C1-Mobius, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform


Supported Devices:

Watch Face C1-Mobius supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:

- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: Wish I had a watch The watches are too expensive for me to get one I wish I could have this as a widget but unfortunately not it's absolutely beautiful and I really wanted it
Too many app permissions! For a watch face these many app permissions doesn't justify. Beware!!
Identification? Why do a watchface need all these permissions?? I certainly do not like that!
